sets.description: Final damage increased by **10%/12%/14%/16%**. When the azure dragon hits the target, the damage from the character's skills increases by **30%** for **30** seconds. This effect works in the background, and if multiple sets are used, the highest star set will take effect.

When using at least **1** volt weapon, all elemental damage increases by **28%/32%/36%/40%**, and Mimi's skill and discharge skill increase crit damage by **20%** for **30** seconds. This effect works in the background, and if multiple sets are used, the highest star set will take effect.
